data.lyric:
[ti:No Judgement]
[ar:Niall Horan]
[al:No Judgement]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]No Judgement - Niall Horan (奈尔·霍兰)
[00:03.59]Lyrics by：Julian Bunetta/Tobias Jesso Jr./Niall Horan/Alexander Izquierdo/John Ryan
[00:07.19]Composed by：Julian Bunetta/Tobias Jesso Jr./Niall Horan/Alexander Izquierdo/John Ryan
[00:10.79]Barefoot and a bottle of wine
[00:15.50]You can stay with me tonight
[00:20.02]You don't have to change when I'm around ya
[00:24.72]So go ahead and say what's on your mind on your mind
[00:29.56]When you're with me no judgement
[00:32.01]You can get that from anyone else
[00:34.34]You don't have to prove nothin'
[00:36.74]You can just be yourself
[00:39.16]When you're with me no judgement
[00:41.55]We can get that from everyone else
[00:43.79]And we don't have to prove nothin'
[00:46.23]When you're with me no judgement
[00:49.75]Mm oh we don't have to prove nothin'
[00:54.10]Mm when you're with me no judgement
[00:58.54]I get us breakfast in the morning
[01:03.52]Or you can slip out in the night
[01:08.04]You don't have to give me a warning
[01:13.00]'Cause we both got nothing to hide nothing to hide
[01:16.58]Even though we don't talk for a couple of months yeah
[01:19.22]It's like we don't lose any time
[01:21.75]I can be your lover or your shoulder to cry on
[01:24.13]You can be whoever you like oh
[01:27.09]When you're with me no judgement
[01:29.55]You can get that from anyone else
[01:31.99]You don't have to prove nothin'
[01:34.34]You can just be yourself
[01:36.78]When you're with me no judgement
[01:39.14]We can get that from everyone else
[01:41.46]And we don't have to prove nothin'
[01:43.93]When you're with me no judgement
[01:47.49]Mm oh we don't have to prove nothin'
[01:52.11]Mm when you're with me no judgement
[01:56.03]I hope we never change
[01:59.68]Even though we both know that we'll move on
[02:05.85]I'll keep your secrets safe
[02:09.29]Until the time we both find ourselves alone again oh
[02:15.13]When you're with me no judgement
[02:17.61]You can get that from anyone else
[02:20.05]You don't have to prove nothin'
[02:22.30]You can just be yourself
[02:24.68]When you're with me no judgement
[02:27.20]We can get that from everyone else
[02:29.42]And we don't have to prove nothin'
[02:31.94]When you're with me no judgement
[02:35.01]Mm oh we don't have to prove nothin'
[02:40.19]Mm when you're with me no judgement
[02:44.63]Mm oh we don't have to prove nothin'
[02:49.49]Mm when you're with me no judgement
data.trans:
[ti:No Judgement]
[ar:Niall Horan]
[al:No Judgement]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.59]//
[00:07.19]//
[00:10.79]光着脚丫 拿着一瓶酒
[00:15.50]今晚与我共度良宵
[00:20.02]当我在你身边 你不必改变分毫
[00:24.72]因此勇敢地吐露心声
[00:29.56]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[00:32.01]评价你 那是别人的事
[00:34.34]你不需要证明什么
[00:36.74]做你自己就好
[00:39.16]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[00:41.55]评价我们 那是别人的事
[00:43.79]我们不需要证明什么
[00:46.23]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[00:49.75]我们不需要证明什么
[00:54.10]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[00:58.54]清晨 我备好可口的早餐
[01:03.52]也许你晚上可以溜出家门
[01:08.04]你不需要提醒我
[01:13.00]因为我们无需隐瞒
[01:16.58]即使我们好几个月没说过话
[01:19.22]可我们没有错过任何美好时光
[01:21.75]我可以成为你的恋人 或者在你哭泣时给你依靠
[01:24.13]你可以随心所欲地成为你喜欢的人
[01:27.09]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[01:29.55]评价你 那是别人的事
[01:31.99]你不需要证明什么
[01:34.34]做你自己就好
[01:36.78]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[01:39.14]评价我们 那是别人的事
[01:41.46]我们不需要证明什么
[01:43.93]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[01:47.49]我们不需要证明什么
[01:52.11]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[01:56.03]我希望我们从未改变
[01:59.68]即使我深知我们会放下过去 继续前进
[02:05.85]我会保守你的秘密
[02:09.29]直到我们再次孤独无依
[02:15.13]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[02:17.61]评价你 那是别人的事
[02:20.05]你不需要证明什么
[02:22.30]做你自己就好
[02:24.68]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[02:27.20]评价我们 那是别人的事
[02:29.42]我们不需要证明什么
[02:31.94]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
[02:35.01]我们不需要证明什么
[02:40.19]当你与我在一起时 我不会对你品头论足
